subject: Baseball
Eyeglasses
Eyes and Eyesight
lead_paragraph: When the Mets acquired the reliever days before the trade deadline last month, one of his first orders of business was getting a new pair of glasses, with frames colored Mets blue.
snippet: When the Mets acquired the reliever days before the trade deadline last month, one of his first orders of business was getting a new pair of glasses, with frames colored Mets blue.
